entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sydenham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:58 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 10:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: NE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing late in the evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
